comments: Rozier's (CHA) right leg slightly extends forward as he fades away and marginal contact occurs with Valanciunas' (NOP) left leg during Valanciunas' close-out of the jump shot attempt.

Richards' (CHA) left arm comes forward as he attempts to bring both hands to the ball and marginal contact occurs with Williamson's (NOP) head/neck area prior to Williamson cleanly ripping the ball away during the rebound. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Rozier (CHA) turns slightly prior to marginal contact occurring with Williamson's (NOP) side/left arm following the change of possession.
Hayward (CHA) and Valanciunas (NOP) engage and disengage with one another off-ball in the post.
Hayward (CHA) does not inbound the ball within five seconds.
Daniels (NOP) cleanly dislodges the ball away from Rozier (CHA) during the inbound.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Williamson's (NOP) shot attempt, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Richards (CHA) establishes himself in Daniels' (NOP) path and does not deliver illegal contact during the pick.
Bridges' (CHA) left arm comes forward as he braces for the impending contact with Williamson (NOP) during the drive, which is marginal and absorbed by Bridges.
Williamson (NOP) brings his off-arm toward Bridges' (CHA) back and marginal contact occurs as they come together in the lane during the drive.
Rozier (CHA) retreats his left arm away from McCollum's (NOP) path and marginal contact occurs with McCollum's right arm as he gathers the ball.
Daniels (NOP) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Rozier (CHA) in transition.
Jones (NOP) grasps and then quickly releases Miller's (CHA) jersey during the inbound.
Daniels (NOP) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.

Daniels (NOP) is stopping short of Rozier (CHA) and would avoid Rozier if he did not slightly extend his right leg backward to initiate the marginal contact during the jump shot attempt. After communicating with the Replay Center, the on-court ruling of a 3 point basket stood.
Rozier (CHA) briefly has his arms around Murphy III's (NOP) upper body before correcting as Murphy III receives the inbound.
Hayward (CHA) brings his arms forward prior to marginal contact occurring with Murphy III's (NOP) right side as he picks up his dribble.
Jones (NOP) and Bridges (CHA) come together in pursuit of the loose ball and incidental body contact occurs during the rebound.
Bridges (CHA) commits a take foul on Jones (NOP).
Hayward (CHA) commits a take foul on Jones (NOP).

Jones (NOP) raises his right arm up and initiates contact with Bridges' (CHA) left arm prior to the release of his jump shot attempt. After communicating with the Replay Center, the on-court ruling of a 3 point field goal was confirmed.
Hayward (CHA) commits a take foul on Ingram (NOP).
Miller (CHA) establishes himself in a wide screening position and extends his foot out, which causes Marshall (NOP) to trip.
Daniels (NOP) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Rozier (CHA) steps out of bounds prior to making contact with the ball in an attempt to save it back into play.
